gradle_caches.name: Gradle Build Cache
gradle_caches.description: Stores downloaded dependencies and build outputs from Gradle builds
gradle_caches.impact: Your next Android/Gradle build will be slower as dependencies re-download, but everything rebuilds automatically.

gradle_wrapper.name: Gradle Wrapper Downloads
gradle_wrapper.description: Cached Gradle distribution files downloaded by the wrapper
gradle_wrapper.impact: The wrapper will re-download Gradle distributions on your next build, adding a few minutes.

cursor_cache.name: Cursor Editor Cache
cursor_cache.description: Temporary files and cache used by Cursor editor for faster performance
cursor_cache.impact: Cursor may feel slightly slower on first launch after deletion, but will rebuild cache automatically.

vscode_extensions.name: VS Code Extensions
vscode_extensions.description: Installed VS Code extensions and their cached data
vscode_extensions.impact: You'll need to reinstall extensions. Only delete if you're sure you don't need them.

android_avd.name: Android Virtual Devices
android_avd.impact: Deleting this removes your Android emulators. You'll need to recreate them in Android Studio.

android_build_cache.name: Android Build Cache
android_build_cache.description: Cached build outputs from Android projects
android_build_cache.impact: Your next Android build will be slower, but everything rebuilds automatically.

cargo_registry_cache.name: Rust Package Cache
cargo_registry_cache.impact: Cargo will re-download packages on your next build, but everything rebuilds automatically.

npm_cache.name: NPM Package Cache
npm_cache.description: Cached npm packages downloaded from the registry
npm_cache.impact: npm will re-download packages on your next install, but everything works normally.

generic_cache.name: Generic Application Cache
generic_cache.description: General cache directory used by various applications
generic_cache.impact: Some applications may feel slower on first launch, but caches rebuild automatically.

pip_cache.name: Python Pip Cache
pip_cache.description: Cached Python packages downloaded by pip
pip_cache.impact: pip will re-download packages on your next install, but everything works normally.

maven_cache.name: Maven Repository Cache
maven_cache.impact: Maven will re-download dependencies on your next build, but everything rebuilds automatically.

windows_temp.name: Windows Temp Files
windows_temp.description: System temporary files created by Windows and applications
windows_temp.impact: Windows will recreate temp files as needed. Safe to clean if no programs are running.

user_temp.name: User Temp Files
user_temp.impact: Applications will recreate temp files as needed. Safe to clean.

windows_update_downloads.name: Windows Update Downloads
windows_update_downloads.description: Downloaded Windows update files (safe after updates are installed)
windows_update_downloads.impact: Windows will re-download updates if needed. Only clean if your system is up to date.

windows_logs.name: Windows Log Files
windows_logs.description: System log files older than 90 days
windows_logs.impact: Old logs are rarely needed. Windows will create new logs as needed.

package_cache.name: Installer Package Cache
package_cache.description: Cached installer files from Microsoft and other programs
package_cache.impact: You may need to re-download installers for repairs/uninstalls. Usually safe to clean.

chrome_cache.name: Chrome Browser Cache
chrome_cache.description: Cached web pages, images, and other browser data
chrome_cache.impact: Chrome will rebuild cache automatically. You'll need to re-login to some sites.

edge_cache.name: Edge Browser Cache
edge_cache.description: Cached web pages, images, and other browser data
edge_cache.impact: Edge will rebuild cache automatically. You'll need to re-login to some sites.

firefox_cache.name: Firefox Browser Cache
firefox_cache.description: Cached web pages and browser data (scans all profiles)
firefox_cache.impact: Firefox will rebuild cache automatically. You'll need to re-login to some sites.

downloads_old.name: Old Downloads
downloads_old.description: Files in Downloads folder older than 180 days
downloads_old.impact: These files will be permanently deleted. Review the list before cleaning.

recycle_bin.name: Recycle Bin
recycle_bin.description: Deleted files waiting to be permanently removed
recycle_bin.impact: Files will be permanently deleted. You can review contents before emptying.
